item.title: Onimusha 2: Samurai’s Destiny remaster demo now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • Switch
  • Xbox One

Demo launched six months after game's release.

A demo for the Onimusha 2: Samurai’s Destiny remaster is now available for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam, Capcom announced. Save data from the demo cannot be transferred to the full game.

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Capcom:

Reclaim Your Destiny.

Onimusha 2: Samurai’s Destiny returns with higher resolution graphics and modernised controls. Experience the gripping storyline and intense swordplay action that propelled this Capcom classic to sell over two million units worldwide.

The lead protagonist of Onimusha 2 is non other than Jubei Yagyu, an Oni warrior modelled after the famous Japanese actor, Yusaku Matsuda. Jubei gains new fighting techniques thanks to the Oni power. Unleash the power of a Critical Attack and dominate the battlefield!

Onimusha 2: Samurai’s Destiny launched for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on May 23.
